main.name: Erick Hernandez
main.description: I obtained an Associate's Degree in Web Design at Grossmont College, located in El Cajon, California
main.bio: I'm Erick and I have strong knowledge of HTML, CSS and JavaScript. I can also customize websites using Bootstrap and WordPress templates. Currently learning more about ReactJS and MERN stack. Finally, my goal is to go beyond getting my work done; I want to make significant changes that will benefit you and your business.
main.contactmessage: Please contact me if you have any questions.

testimonials.text: I don't really remember what my clients have said about my work word by word, I should probably ask them again. But I'll leave this here.
Erick had me impressed with a well done job. I will totally hire him again for future projects.
